name: LibraryThing Easier Tag Editing
description: This style makes tag editing a little easier by making the edit links popup and float over the page rather than shove the following tags down lower.  This way, tags don't shift all over the place when you're trying to edit them.

user.name: brightcopy
user.about: Feel free to drop a message on my LibraryThing profile.  If you have a request for a style, I'd be happy to consider it.
